Description:
-------------
The tower is a mystery to everyone. No one knows why or who built it. Stands defiant to his austere pinnacle reached in the dark sky and surrounding lands that surround it. If you look closely, you appear to be full of true darkness swirling that the mysterious stone spire is full of shadows and waves of darkness inside move from bottom to top. The shadow of a young man, which have been cruelly separated from its owner, dares to venture into the tower. Its clear goal is to reach the top. An innovative game that will surprise anyone who enters it, a different experience created for Nintendo Wii.
